title: 3 and Out - Urban to Dallas Risk/Reward; SEC's Just Better; Wild Card Preview; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Urban to Dallas Risk/Reward; SEC's Just Better; Wild Card Preview; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff discusses the possibility of Urban Meyer to Dallas, the risks involved for both sides, and why SEC haters look ridiculous arguing it's not the #1 conference. He also previews this weekend's Wild Card games and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
